data.title: Louis XI, King of France, Charlotte of Savoy, 2d Wife of Louis XI
meta_keywords: history;medieval;Middle Ages;King of France;Palace of Soissons;Charlotte of Savoy;2d Wife;Louis XI;married;1457;death;Queen Margaret of Scotland;window;Ave Mary Nuns;Paris;Wife of Louis XI
data.meta_description: Download stock image of “Louis XI, King of France, from an original picture in the Palace of Soissons. Charlotte of Savoy, 2d Wife of Louis XI, to whom he was married in 1457, after the death of his first Queen Margaret of Scotland, from a window of the Ave Mary Nuns at Paris. Unidentified book illustration, early 19th century.” from the Look and Learn History Picture Archive
data.meta_site_name: Look and Learn History Picture Library
